document_data.name: Gald
document_data.mainbody:
Sapper '''Gald''' was a [[cult of the Absolute|cultist]] of [[the Absolute]] who lived in the [[Shattered Sanctum]] fortress during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Tieflin's ain't so tough...''|Sapper Gald}}
document_data.Description: Gald had yellow-orange skin and wore simple clothing that included little armor.
document_data.Activities: As a "sapper", Gald was expected to strap a massive [[bomb]] to his back and directly at any structure or fortification that had to be destroyed in dramatic fashion.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Gald was among the [[goblin]]s of the Shattered Sanctum who would immediately set out for the [[Emerald Grove]], once ordered by [[True Soul]] [[Minthara Baenre]].
